#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
using namespace std;

int main()
{
    int t;
    cin>>t;
    char c=getchar();
    while(t--)
    {
        char string[105];
         gets(string);
        int i=0;
        int j=0;
        while(string[i]!=0)
        {
            j=0;
            char a[105];
            while(string[i]!=' ')
            {
                a[j++]=string[i++];
                if(string[i]==0)
                break;
            }
            a[j]=0;
            if(strcmp(a,"8")==0)
            cout<<"ate";
            else if(strcmp(a,"w8")==0)
            cout<<"wait";
             else if(strcmp(a,"gr8")==0)
            cout<<"great";
             else if(strcmp(a,"4")==0)
            cout<<"for";
            else  if(strcmp(a,"b4")==0)
            cout<<"before";
            else cout<<a;
            while(string[i]==' ')
            cout<<string[i++];
            i--;
        i++;
        }
        cout<<"\n";
    }
    return(0);
}
